text: int main ( ) { int tc , n , arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , sum , i , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & tc ) ; while ( tc ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; sum = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) printf ( "%d " , arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; printf ( "\n" ) ; } for ( i = 0 , j = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { sum += MAX ( arr [ i ] [ j ] , arr [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) ; if ( arr [ i ] [ j ] < arr [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) j ++ ; } printf ( "%d" , sum ) ; tc -- ; } return 0 ; }
